verses.content: Aw mi tinrênghai, in kut ben unla, Hlimna râwlin Pathien kuomah khêk ro.
LALPA Achunghnungtak chu ṭi a um sih a. Hnuoi chung po poah Lal ropuitak a nih.
Ama chun mi tin chu ei hnuoiah tukdawl a ta, Hnam tin chu ei ke hnuoiah tukdawl bawk a tih.
Ama chun ei rohluo ding chu mi thlangpêk a ta, A hmangai Jakob sawngtak ram chu.
Pathien chu khêkri leh a hang feh a, LALPA chu tawtawrâwt ri leh a hang fe tah.
Pathien inpâkin hla sak unla, inpâkin sak ro, Ei Laltak inpâkna hla sak unla, inpâkin sak ro.
Pathien chu khawvêl po po Lal a ni sih a, Hrethiema inpâkin hla sak ro.
Pathien chu hnam tin chungah Lalah a ṭhung a, Pathien chu lalṭhungpha inthienga chun a ṭhung a,
Mi tin laia milienhai chu an um khâwm a, Abraham Pathien mihai ni dingin; Leihnuoi phawhai chu Pathien ta a ni sih a, Ama chu nasataka chawimawiin a um a nih.
